item.peripheralworks.tooltip.universal_s: §3§oBest tool to inspect surroundings, if you don't have third eye. Works with turtles and pocket computers
item.peripheralworks.tooltip.ultimate_se: §3§oLimitless possibilities for understanding world in one little box. Works with turtles and pocket computers
item.peripheralworks.tooltip.item_pedest: §3§oCute pedestal, that can store only single item stack. But seems you can get more information about this stack now.
item.peripheralworks.tooltip.map_pedesta: §3§oCute pedestal, that can store only single item stack. Infused with compass, it now can understand maps.
item.peripheralworks.tooltip.display_ped: §3§oCute pedestal, that cannot store anything, but can display literally anything
item.peripheralworks.tooltip.ultimate_co: §3§oOne tool to configure them all. Crouch click on any block to check if it configurable
item.peripheralworks.tooltip.remote_obse: §3§oJust like observer, but can see a little further
item.peripheralworks.tooltip.peripheral_: §3§oAllows you to connect peripherals at the small distances without wired network
text.peripheralworks.remote_observer_not: Cannot connect remote observer to itself
text.peripheralworks.remote_observer_too: Remote observer too far from this block
Too many blocks already connected to this remote observer
text.peripheralworks.remote_observer_blo: Remote observer now tracks this block
Remote observer will not track this block from now
text.peripheralworks.peripheral_proxy_no: Cannot connect peripheral proxy to itself
text.peripheralworks.peripheral_proxy_to: Peripheral proxy too far from this block
Too many peripherals already connected to this peripheral proxy
text.peripheralworks.peripheral_proxy_is: This block does not contains a peripheral
text.peripheralworks.peripheral_proxy_bl: This peripheral is connected to peripheral proxy
This peripheral is disconnected from peripheral proxy
